replies.body: Yi? Yi can't 1v1 anyone with a hard cc
in what world does Fizz have hard cc? Yi can alpha strike and avoid the ult...

zed? fizz just uses e and he wins

Talon? if he gets touched by fizz ult, or fizz uses e at right moment, he dies

Zed definitely beats fizz. Much better early on, and after 6 fizz cant win all ins unless zed ults him for no reason, and can't use e to farm or dodge poke otherwise zed can kill him with ult. "Fizz just uses e and wins" is only applicable if the zed has no idea how to play the matchup. Its a matchup where neither can kill the other if they play properly but fizz should get heavily outfarmed, poked out of lane, and have a much harder time roaming.
I have never seen or played this matchup where the Zed beats the Fizz. Fizz will win this fight 9 times out of 10

Than those Zeds are either idiots or come across a good Fizz.

A good Fizz is someone who realises that 9/10 fights are easily won and will continue to use him and be that much better with him that an average player can't contend with him.

I had one of those recently when I was playing Annie, every time I would Q, he would troll pole, EVERY, SINGLE, TIME.

Got on my nerves the first few hundred times, but I took advantage of him, throw my Q on him, he would troll pole and take no damage, but neither would I. You can figure out the rest, my point is that even when Fizz, or anyone for that matter counters you, if you take advantage of how they counter you you can use it to your advantage.
Talon could 1 hit anyone in 0.25 seconds I don't think many players can respond that fast.
It's not literally 0.25 seconds.... and plus Fizz has 0.75 seconds of invulnerability at the press of a button

My friend who recently got master with talon can use ult run like 1/4 of the map jump on an enemy and kill them in less then 0.25 seconds dealing over 1.2K damage then bleed and ignite a fizz might use e to go invisible. But, he only going to get shredded instantly by being ignited and bleeding.

Unless, its a direct 1v1 and both start in mid lane next to each other fizz will have a chance then.
To kill someone with Talon ult like initiating with it before he even goes on the target, they'd need to be cc'd or just standing still lel
well the target he normally gets is farming a wave and not moving much. So it is normally the best time to strike. Also doesn't Talon's e slow an enemy for like 99%?

Yes it does

for 0.25 seconds lol
well that's how long it takes for a talon to do his combo if your a pro at it.(unfortunately I'm not pro at it.)

Look, a REALLY fed Talon could probably one shot someone if he ulted before in vision of his enemy and then E'd onto the enemy and they STOOD there and took the WHOLE ULT while Talon Q'd. But A, that would have to be a REALLY fed Talon, he's most likely need to W, Ignite, Hydra as well, which would take more than 0.25 seconds.

Plus you gotta remember that it's a SLOW they can still dash/flash/jump/blink away from him and although the slow is strong , it only lasts for 0.25 seconds, one quick side step can make Talon miss half his ult.

I'm not doubting that your Master friend can kill someone in 0.25 seconds, I just don't think he does that on a regular basis. It would take proper set up and the right circumstances.

BUT, Talon DEFINITELY DOES have the fastest 100-0 combo in the game. That I agree with.
depends when talon ulted

A good Fizz will never lose to a Yi, but a good Yi will never lose to a Fizz. It just turns into a stale mate. If you do catch Fizz alone with none of your own minions you can kill him quite easy, but a good Fizz will try to avoid that if there is a Yi about.

Fizz can just dash through a minion, wait for a Yi Q, then TROLL POLE AND AWAY!

Yi can just Q through his Ult and if there are minions around, Q through them when he troll poles you, or wait for his troll pole and pump your ult into him while saving Q for his Ult.

You get nowhere with that match up with 2 players who know what to do.
Fizz can literally just straight up one shot Yi in like two abilities and an auto. Also if Fizz E's right before his ult hits, Yi can no longer dodge
THATS THE ONE! I keep forgetting what the matchup was that I loved running into Fizz. Gaddaamit it was Lissandra haha
I have had success with ryze and diana.
I've heard Diana is gr88888888 into fishy

ryze and diana are why counter picks are a thing. Fizz (and zed) had ALWAYS given my regular mid picks a heap of grief.

2 matches a piece with diana and ryze and I am wiping the floor with fizz after 2 years of having no counter play against him.

Counters exist, people.
Mostly Zed and Le Blanc, maybe lissandra are really good against fizz
Zed is a no. LB is a skill matchup and Lissandra is pretty good into Fizz
{{champion:268}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:86}}
Watch me shutdown fizz in one burst with {{champion:24}}
